TopicTitle: Help! Game stopped working and will no longer launch!!! (v0.19 Mac OS X / Steam)

Articles.Content:
Last night, KSP crashed, and took my computer for a reboot. Now whenever I try to launch it, I get a popup asking me if I want to "reopen windows" (which is a thing that happens when your Mac crashes), then, without clicking anything, a Mac crash report. When I click "Reopen", it just crashes again. I've tried completely cleaning it out and reinstalling (several times), but it just says the same thing. Are there some log files I can look at or something, to try and diagnose the problem?

Deets:

Running v0.19, on Mac OS X Lion.

Installed (and reinstalled, and reinstalled and reinstalled) through Steam.

No Mods.

Help me get back to my Kerbals!!! ;.;;.;

EDIT: Firstly, this should be in support forum (Didn't see that forum before I posted. Sorry!). If some generous mod could move this there, that would be awesome. Secondly, I SOLVED MY PROBLEM! For anyone else who comes across this issue after a crash on Mac, solution is here: http://steamcommunity.com/app/220200/discussions/0/828937262014157954/

Edited May 8, 2013 by roach

This should be in support.

Im not a Mac er so someone else can help you out.
